name: Doodle Shooter
description:
Hey there! I recently created a 2D game on Unity that I'd love for you to try out. It's a space shooter game with a unique twist – everything is hand-drawn and looks like doodles on a notebook. It's a fun and quirky take on the classic space shooter genre that I think you'll enjoy.

I put a lot of time and effort into designing every aspect of the game. I'm really proud of how it turned out, and I think you'll appreciate the attention to detail that went into making it.

I'd really appreciate your feedback on the game. I'm always looking for ways to improve and make it even more fun and engaging for players. So if you have a chance to play it, please let me know what you think!
